about_the_game:
In this horror game you will explore a huge abandoned amusement park with a creepy circus.
Will you be able to solve all the puzzles that await you on the path to escape?

Explore a dark amusement park: old abandoned buildings, scary basements, mysterious mazes and creepy circus.
Solve puzzles and search, collect, and use items in order to understand the horror story and survive.



Do not make noise and be careful because a evil clown might see or hear you! Keep your eyes open and use cover to hide from it to stay alive.

There are multiple endings in Death Park. Your decisions and actions will affect the outcome of the game. Play again to discover the other endings.

Death Park features:


  • An original plot with multiple endings
  • A huge map with 7 locations to explore
  • A terrifying and crafty evil clown
  • Hardcore puzzles
  • A nightmarish atmosphere

This is our first game. If you know how to improve it, just leave feedback! If you want to help us with the translation, just message us!

Enjoy the game, friends!

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains some gore content.

name: Death Park

subs.option_text: Death Park : Scary Clown Survival Horror Game - $5.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core TM i5 750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Sapphire Radeon HD 5770 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.

short_description: Can you solve all the puzzles and escape from the scary clown in this horror game? It is already waiting for you!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
